mapper.select: SELECT TD.id , TD.nm , TD.door_sch_id , TDC.door_sch_nm , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( TDD.door_id SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_DOORGRP_DOOR TDD WHERE TDD.doorgrp_id= TD.id ) AS door_ids , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( (SELECT A.door_nm FROM T_DOOR A where A.id = TDD.door_id ) SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_DOORGRP_DOOR TDD WHERE TDD.doorgrp_id= TD.id ) AS door_nms , (select COUNT(TDD.door_id) from T_DOORGRP_DOOR TDD where TDD.doorgrp_id = TD.id) AS door_cnt , DATE_FORMAT(TD.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_at , DATE_FORMAT(TD.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as updated_at -- FROM T_DOORGRP TD FROM T_SCH_DOORGRP TD LEFT JOIN T_DOOR_SCH TDC on TD.door_sch_id = TDC.id WHERE TD.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DOORGRP SET door_sch_id = null , updated_at= NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
